content: I'm glad you like the suggestions! I'm still deciding on the starter and dessert, can you suggest some wine pairing options for the Bruschetta with Fresh Tomato, Basil, and Mozzarella and the Tiramisu? And by the way, I've been keeping a cooking journal to track my progress and note down any tips or techniques I learn in class, it's been really helpful in identifying patterns and areas where I need to improve.
